summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.6°C), outside temperature (down 3.4°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 330 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4112 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and moderately breezy. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and bright intervals likely. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
